column5: Anyone use this outfitter lately? I'm looking for trophy pike fishing with a bit of walleye for shore lunch. Would like to know numbers and size of fish to expect.

I've never fished with Oliver but I spent some time talking with him and guys that fish with him,I was in clova fishing with air tamarac(another great outfitter)I went to Oliver's house and chewed the fat with him.a guy was in town that fished with him for 20yrs and he said all his lakes were good.small lakes,single cabins,all yours for the week.i would go early June for the best bite anywhere in northern quebec.
